resources.string: The chart shows the dynamic of changes in the amount of money in your balance.
Here you can see detailed information about all transactions.
Enter the amount and press button Recharge. Your balance will increase when the operation is confirmed.
History of Recharge Operations you will see in the Check option after pressing button Recharge.
You can withdraw money using default denominations and numbers of each or you can choose what you want.
Enter the amount of money you want to withdraw and press button Submit.
In the next step you will be able to choose denominations and number of banknotes.
